question: Write a letter to a friend who will come to your country to work for 6 months. In your letter, you should:recommend a citysuggest a few jobs that your friend could dogive some opinions about making friends with the locals.
text: I hope this letter finds you in the pink of your health. As you mentioned last time about your half-year visit to my country, I thought of writing about a few suggestions.

India is a big country, filled with a myriad of opportunities. However, I would suggest you  choose Gurgaon as your work destination during your stay, because the majority of the multi-national companies are in that city and you’ll find jobs related to your field quickly.

As you’ve recently finished your studies, companies might not hire you directly as a permanent employee. Therefore, it’s totally fine to start with an internship. Also, I have recently come across a few openings for companies such as Digitech and Nokia. So, you should definitely try your luck with that.

Needless to say that I will always be there to help you; still, it would be better for you to start expanding your network in India. Besides, you’ve plenty of Indian friends on your LinkedIn, start connecting with them. Such references will be extremely beneficial while finding a job.
Let me know if you need anything.
